title: Efficient Medical Procedure Learning Design in Operating Room Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and operating room procedures
context.additional_context: Microlearning design reflecting the impact of physical layout in operating room learning environments on educational effectiveness for practicing professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more differences in learning effectiveness based on operating room spatial arrangements (visibility, positioning).
Learners can accurately reproduce over 80% of key steps through a surgical procedure simulation module provided in a mobile environment.
Learners can propose team-based improvement plans for operating room learning environments and demonstrate their feasibility via project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
